Title: Ray-Ban RB3671CH Chromance Sunglasses.
Text:
These are brand new, never worn (feel free to inspect, they are flawless). Reducing my collection.

Ray-Ban RB3671CH Chromance sunglasses redefine the boundary between performance and style.
Featuring a pillow shape and crafted from durable metal, these glasses are designed to withstand wear and tear.
The dark green polarized lenses not only enhance contrast and clarity but also eliminate glare for optimal vision.
The polished black on silver frame adds a touch of sophistication to any look.
With their superior optical quality and stylish design, these shades are a versatile choice for everyday wear.
